outside of plugins, palettes and other i: Heavily modified GSD5 plugin for use in project management.
what are we doing well? prompts for thin: TW is great from a pure developer or computer programmer perspective. There is significant support in the community. Lovely people, very knowledgeable, ready to help anytime. TW is being maintained and upgraded at a fast pace.
what could we do better? prompts for thi: TW is not very good from an end user perspective. Talk TiddlyWiki is a terrible place for an end user. There are too many topics, ideas, plugins, etc., completely disorganized. Urgently, something needs to be done to make TW more appealing to people with little computer programming experience, and those with little time to read/go over the huge amount of posts. The learning curve could be greatly improved if a place separately from Talk TiddlyWiki be created to organize all the knowledge.
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
